This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was stopped at a traffic light while driving. i don't remember the exact time of day but it was daytime and there was plenty of light. i looked up at the light and saw something in the sky above the tree line across the intersection. it looked like a silver disc. not big at all. it was completely still in the sky and i had no idea what it was. after 10 seconds or so, it slowly moved straight down and disappeared behind the tops of the trees. after i saw the object i knew it wasn't something "normal" that you would find in the sky. it wasn't far away either. it was relatively close, like 1\4 mile away maybe....at the most. i immediately called me sister and told her what i saw.
Summary: Saw a hovering silver disc shape in the sky above the tree line in front of me. Moved straight down and I lost visibility behind the trees.
